name: part_006
file: tmp_【#天音かなた2周年LIVE】無料 3DLIVE 「リベンジ」⧸ Amane Kanata 3DLIVE ＂Revenge＂【天音かなた⧸ホロライブ】 [Dji-ehIz5_k]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Gunjo' by YOASOBI.
Brief transition to the next song performance.

subtitles.original:
（見ないフリしていても）
（確かにはそこにある）
subtitles.english:
(Even if I pretend not to see it)
(It is definitely there)

subtitles.original:
嗚呼 感じたままに描く
自分で選んだその色で
subtitles.english:
Ah, I'll draw it as I feel
With the colors I've chosen for myself

subtitles.original: 眠い空気纏う朝に 訪れた青い世界
subtitles.english: In the morning clad in sleepy air, a blue world arrived

subtitles.original:
好きなものを好きだと言う
怖くて仕方ないけど
subtitles.english:
Saying I like what I like
I can't help but be afraid

subtitles.original: 本当の自分出会えた気がしたんだ
subtitles.english: I felt like I finally met my true self

subtitles.original: 嗚呼、手を伸ばせば 伸ばすほどに 遠くへゆく
subtitles.english: Ah, the more I reach out my hand, the further it goes

subtitles.original: 思うようにいかない今日も また慌ただしくもがいてる
subtitles.english: Today doesn't go as I thought, I'm struggling frantically again

subtitles.original: 悔しい気持ちもただ 情けなくて 涙が出る
subtitles.english: Even this frustrating feeling, just so pathetic, tears come out

subtitles.original: 踏み込むほど 苦しくなる 痛くもなる
subtitles.english: The more I step in, the more painful and agonizing it becomes

subtitles.original: 嗚呼 感じたままに進む 自分で選んだこの道を
subtitles.english: Ah, I'll move forward as I feel, on this path I've chosen for myself

subtitles.original: 重い目蓋擦る夜に しがみついた青い誓い
subtitles.english: In the night rubbing heavy eyelids, I clung to a blue oath

subtitles.original: 好きなことを続けること それは楽しいだけじゃない
subtitles.english: Continuing to do what I love, it's not just about fun

subtitles.original: 本当にできる？ 不安になるけど
subtitles.english: Can I really do it? I get anxious, but...

subtitles.original: 何回でも ほら何回でも 自信がないから描いてきたんだよ
subtitles.english: Again and again, look, again and again, I've drawn because I lacked confidence

subtitles.original: 何回でも ほら何回でも 積み上げてきたことが武器になる
subtitles.english: Again and again, look, again and again, what I've built up will become my weapon

subtitles.original: 周りを見たって 誰と比べたって 僕にしかできないことはあんだ
subtitles.english: Even if I look around, even if I compare with others, there are things only I can do

subtitles.original: 今でも 自信なんかない それでも
subtitles.english: Even now, I don't have any confidence, but still...

subtitles.original: 感じたことない気持ち 知らずにいた想い
subtitles.english: Feelings I've never felt, thoughts I didn't know I had

subtitles.original: あの日踏み出して 初めて感じたこの痛みも全部
subtitles.english: Stepping out that day, even all this pain I felt for the first time

subtitles.original: 好きなものと向き合うことで 触れたまだ小さな光
subtitles.english: By facing what I like, I touched a light that's still small

subtitles.original: 大丈夫、行こう あとは楽しむだけだ
subtitles.english: It's okay, let's go. All that's left is to enjoy it

subtitles.original: 嗚呼 全てを賭けて描く 自分にしか出せない色で
subtitles.english: Ah, I'll draw by betting everything, with colors only I can produce

subtitles.original: 朝も夜も走り続け 見つけ出した青い光
subtitles.english: Running through both morning and night, I found the blue light

subtitles.original: 好きなものと向き合うこと 今だって怖いことだけど
subtitles.english: Facing what I like, even now it's a scary thing, but...

subtitles.original: もう今は あの日の透明な僕じゃない
subtitles.english: I'm no longer that transparent version of myself from that day

subtitles.original: 嗚呼 ありのままの かけがえのない僕だ
subtitles.english: Ah, I'm just as I am, irreplaceable

subtitles.original:
（知らず知らず隠してた）
（本当の声を響かせてよ ほら）
subtitles.english:
(I was hiding it without knowing)
(Let your true voice resound, look)

subtitles.original:
（見ないフリしていても）
（確かにはそこには今もそこにある）
subtitles.english:
(Even if you pretend not to see it)
(It is definitely there, still there now)

subtitles.original:
（知らず知らず隠してた）
（本当の声を響かせてよ さあ）
subtitles.english:
(I was hiding it without knowing)
(Let your true voice resound, come on)

subtitles.original:
（見ないフリしていても）
（確かにはそこに君の中に）
subtitles.english:
(Even if you pretend not to see it)
(It is definitely there, inside you)

subtitles.original:
Don't take your love away.
You ain't heard nothin' yet-yet.
subtitles.english:
Don't take your love away.
You ain't heard nothin' yet-yet.

subtitles.original:
Don't take your love away.
Wake up, make up, bang bang.
subtitles.english:
Don't take your love away.
Wake up, make up, bang bang.

subtitles.original: また鳴り出した表示はあなた「今、忙しいの」
subtitles.english: The display started ringing again, it's you. "I'm busy right now."

subtitles.original: [A]ddiction feat.Mori Calliope
subtitles.english: [A]ddiction feat.Mori Calliope

subtitles.original:
未読のトークとラブコールも
いっぱいでせわしない「邪魔をしないで頂戴」
subtitles.english:
Unread chats and love calls,
it's too much and busy. "Please don't disturb me."

subtitles.original: Cuz you refuse cooperation, better stick out your lip
subtitles.english: Cuz you refuse cooperation, better stick out your lip

subtitles.original:
Too used to sayin' "I don't wanna",
no doubt you're still a kid
subtitles.english:
Too used to sayin' "I don't wanna",
no doubt you're still a kid

subtitles.original: 本音は言わない方が悩ましい
subtitles.english: It's more troublesome not to say what you're really thinking

subtitles.original: 甘い言葉かけるよりもずっと愛しい
subtitles.english: Far more lovely than saying sweet words

subtitles.original: たまらなく欲するほど 求めて離さないで
subtitles.english: So much that it's unbearable, seek me and don't let go

subtitles.original: キスじゃ足りなくて いっそ殺して
subtitles.english: A kiss isn't enough, just kill me instead

subtitles.original: Predilection あなたを手に掛けて
subtitles.english: Predilection, getting my hands on you

subtitles.original: Infatuation 呼吸さえ止めて
subtitles.english: Infatuation, even stopping my breath

subtitles.original: Dedication このまま
subtitles.english: Dedication, just like this

subtitles.original: Addiction してまだたった一口で「終わり」
subtitles.english: Addiction, and yet just one taste and it's over

subtitles.original: Predilection さあ口をつけて
subtitles.english: Predilection, now put your mouth to it

subtitles.original: Infatuation そのまま飲み込んで
subtitles.english: Infatuation, just swallow it as is

subtitles.original: Dedication すぐさま
subtitles.english: Dedication, immediately

subtitles.original:
Addiction してほらたった一口
死ぬほど愛したいから
subtitles.english:
Addiction, look, just one taste
Because I want to love you to death

subtitles.original:
Don't take your love away.
You ain't heard nothin' yet-yet.
subtitles.english:
Don't take your love away.
You ain't heard nothin' yet-yet.

subtitles.original:
Don't take your love away.
Wake up, make up, bang bang.
subtitles.english:
Don't take your love away.
Wake up, make up, bang bang.

subtitles.original:
Uh, have it all, like it love is overflowing
Be the only one you got, I don't think you'll be going, going
subtitles.english:
Uh, have it all, like it love is overflowing
Be the only one you got, I don't think you'll be going, going

subtitles.original:
Uh, take it off, still it's not enough for me
Stuck. With. You. There's no room for other things.
subtitles.english:
Uh, take it off, still it's not enough for me
Stuck. With. You. There's no room for other things.
